statements: SELECT * FROM land_types;
SELECT land_type_name, land_classification FROM land_types;
SELECT land_type_id, land_type_name, land_classification FROM land_types ORDER BY land_type_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_types WHERE land_classification='Agricultural';
SELECT land_type_id, land_type_name FROM land_types WHERE land_type_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM land_types ORDER BY land_type_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT land_type_name, land_classification FROM land_types WHERE land_classification = 'Forest' OR land_classification = 'Desert' ORDER BY land_type_name ASC;
SELECT land_type_id, land_type_name, land_classification FROM land_types WHERE land_type_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT land_type_name FROM land_types WHERE land_classification = 'Grassland' AND land_type_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY land_type_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT land_classification FROM land_types ORDER BY land_classification DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM LandTypes WHERE land_type_id = 1;
SELECT land_type_name, land_type_description FROM LandTypes WHERE land_type_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM Classifications WHERE classification_value < 100;
SELECT classification_name, classification_value FROM Classifications WHERE classification_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM LandTypes ORDER BY land_type_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandTypes ORDER BY land_type_name DESC, land_type_id ASC
SELECT land_type_name, land_type_description FROM LandTypes WHERE land_type_id = 2
SELECT classification_name, classification_value FROM Classifications WHERE classification_value > 100 ORDER BY classification_value DESC
SELECT * FROM LandTypes WHERE land_type_name LIKE 'F%'
SELECT classification_name, classification_value FROM Classifications WHERE classification_value < 50 ORDER BY classification_name ASC
SELECT * FROM LandTypes;
SELECT land_name, land_type FROM LandTypes WHERE land_area > 1000;
SELECT * FROM LandClassifications WHERE classification_type = 'Agricultural';
SELECT classification_name, classification_type FROM LandClassifications ORDER BY classification_name DESC;

SELECT record_date, land_name, classification_name FROM LandRecords JOIN LandTypes ON LandRecords.land_id = LandTypes.land_id JOIN LandClassifications ON LandRecords.classification_id = LandClassifications.classification_id;
SELECT * FROM LandTypes WHERE land_area > 100 ORDER BY land_name ASC;
SELECT land_name, land_type FROM LandTypes WHERE land_type = 'Residential' LIMIT 5;

SELECT record_date, classification_name FROM LandRecords JOIN LandClassifications ON LandRecords.classification_id = LandClassifications.classification_id WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY record_date DESC;

SELECT land_name, classification_name, record_date FROM LandRecords JOIN LandTypes ON LandRecords.land_id = LandTypes.land_id JOIN LandClassifications ON LandRecords.classification_id = LandClassifications.classification_id WHERE classification_type = 'Urban';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_records, AVG(land_area) AS avg_area FROM LandTypes GROUP BY land_type HAVING avg_area > 50 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandTypes;
SELECT id, land_type FROM LandTypes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT classification_name, description FROM LandClassifications WHERE classification_code = 'ABC';
SELECT id, location_point, data_value FROM SpatialData WHERE data_type IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM LandMapping WHERE land_type_id = 1 AND classification_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM LandTypes;
SELECT classification_name, description FROM LandClassifications ORDER BY classification_name DESC;
SELECT id, location_point, data_value FROM SpatialData WHERE data_type = 'Water' ORDER BY data_value DESC;

SELECT lt.land_type, lc.classification_name, sd.data_value FROM LandMapping lm JOIN LandTypes lt ON lm.land_type_id = lt.id JOIN LandClassifications lc ON lm.classification_id = lc.id JOIN SpatialData sd ON lm.spatial_data_id = sd.id;
SELECT * FROM LandMapping lm WHERE lm.land_type_id = (SELECT id FROM LandTypes WHERE land_type = 'Forest');
SELECT * FROM land_types;
SELECT classification_name, classification_description FROM classifications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_name FROM spatial_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT visualization_name, visualization_type FROM visualization WHERE id > 3;
SELECT map_id, land_type_id, classification_id FROM mapping_data WHERE land_type_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM land_types;
SELECT classification_name, classification_description FROM classifications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT visualization_name, visualization_type, visualization_data FROM visualization WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT data_name FROM spatial_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT map_id, land_type_id, classification_id FROM mapping_data WHERE land_type_id = 2 AND classification_id = 1;
